definition.name: NXlab_electro_chemo_mechanical_preparation

symbols.doc: The symbols used in the schema to specify e.g. dimensions of arrays.

definition.doc: Grinding and polishing of a sample using abrasives in a wet lab. Manual procedures, electro-chemical, vibropolishing.

attribute.name: version
attribute.doc: Version specifier of this application definition.

field.name: definition
field.doc: Official NeXus NXDL schema with which this file was written.

group.name: GRINDING_STEP
group.doc: A preparation step performed by a human or a robot/automated system.

field.name: abrasive_medium_carrier
field.doc: Carrier/plate used on which the abrasive/(lubricant) mixture was applied.

field.name: abrasive_medium
field.doc: Medium on the abrasive_medium_carrier (cloth or grinding plate) whereby material is abrasively weared.

field.name: rotation_control
field.doc: Qualitative statement how the revelation of the machine was configured. If the rotation was controlled manually, e.g. by turning knobs choose manual and estimate the nominal average rotation. If the rotation was controlled via choosing from a fixed set of options offered by the machine choose fixed and specify the nominal rotation. If programmed use rotation_history (e.g. for automated/robot systems).

field.name: force_control
field.doc: Qualitative statement how the (piston) force with which the sample was pressed into/against the abrasive medium was controlled if at all. If the force was controlled manually e.g. by turning knobs choose manual and estimate nominal average force. If the force was controlled via choosing from a fixed set of options offered by the machine choose fixed and specify the nominal force. If programmed use force_history (e.g. for automated/robot systems).

field.name: time_control
field.doc: Qualitative statement for how long (assuming regular uninterrupted) preparation at the specified conditions the preparation step was applied.

field.name: force
field.doc: Force exerted on the sample to press it into the abrasive.

field.name: removal
field.doc: Qualitative statement how the material removal was characterized.

field.name: thickness_reduction
field.doc: How thick a layer was removed.

group.name: CLEANING_STEP
group.doc: A preparation step performed by a human or a robot/automated system with the aim to remove residual abrasive medium from the specimen surface.
